post.text: "If a candidate regularly and flippantly makes cruel and insulting comments about women—about how we look, how we act—well, sadly, that's who that candidate really is." —Michelle Obama

comment.author: Andrea
comment.text: And now Trump is "threatening" to talk about Bill Clinton's actions. So I'd love for Hillary to say something like, "Oh, we're talking about spouses now? Ok, let's talk about ALL your Different spouses Mr. Trump."

replies.author: Andrea
replies.text: He CHEATED on two wives, not just one.

replies.author: Nicholas
replies.text: They both cheated which makes them both cheaters. You can't justify. Geez
